source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is a high-angle, wide-shot view of a modern cityscape during a vibrant sunset or sunrise. The scene is dominated by two large, red construction cranes set against a backdrop of numerous high-rise buildings. The camera appears to be moving along the arm of the crane in the foreground, providing a sweeping panorama of the urban landscape.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This is a high-angle, wide-shot view of a modern cityscape during a vibrant sunset or sunrise. The scene is dominated by two large, red construction cranes set against a backdrop of numerous high-rise buildings. The camera appears to be moving along the arm of the crane in the foreground, providing a sweeping panorama of the urban landscape.
